title: The general session conteining an apologie of the most comfortable doctrine concerning the ende of this world, and seconde comming of Christ, written by Thomas Rogers. The first part, wherein for the comfort of the godlie is proued not onely that God wil, but also that he doth iudge this world.
author: Rogers, Thomas, d. 1616.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed by Henrie Middleton for Andrew Maunsell,
